messages.subject: Pertussis in an unimmunized person
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/26/03 6:47:00 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/26/03 6:47:00 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Hi, Right up my alley.
I'm on week 7 or 8 of pertussis - and I was vaccinated, so don't let the
docs tell you that vaccinations will protect everyone. >>

I know SO many people that were immunized that ended up getting diseases they
were immunized against, so she shouldn't blame herself at all.
In fact, the Pertussis vaccination is one of the worst for causing severe
problems, so she may have saved them suffering or brain damage for all she
knows.
Dose those kids up with HERBS right now. Google Pertussis and natural
remedies and see what comes up.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
